Sketch

  1. Overview

Overview

Sketch is a Common Lisp framework for the creation of electronic art, visual design, game prototyping and making, computer graphics, exploration of human-computer interaction, and more.

with-pen(pen &body body)
Sets environment's pen to `PEN' for all of its enclosed forms. Nesting is allowed.
set-pen(pen)
Sets environment's pen to `PEN'.
flip-pen(pen)
Makes a new pen by swapping `PEN''s fill and stroke colors.
background(color)
Fills the sketch window with `COLOR'.
make-default-pennil
Creates the default pen with `+WHITE+' fill and `+BLACK' stroke.

Created with Codex.
